comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.8 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.942.0 Safari/535.8

Steps to reproduce:

I copied a table from the Numbers application on OSX and pasted it into the tinymce editor (http://www.tinymce.com/tryit/full.php).


Actual results:

The table was inserted as an image.


Expected results:

The table should have been inserted as a table. From looking into it, it seems that firefox prefers images over RTF content when deciding which format to pick from the clipboard.
comments.author: ckiehl@atlassian.com
